LanguageData.ATR_MechanicalSurgerySuccessChanceFactor: A multiplier to the chance that a operation on a mechanical unit will succeed when performed here. Mechanical surgery success chances are also affected by many other factors, including the mechanic's ability.
LanguageData.ATR_MechanicalTendQualityOffset.label: mechanical tend quality offset
LanguageData.ATR_MechanicalTendQualityOffset.descript: Mechanical tend quality is offset by this value.
